location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Captain Charles Pasley, Acting for Brigadier-General John Malcolm

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of a communication received dated 7 November 1808, which concerned Andrew Jukes's allowance. It is also enclosing disbursements and vouchers (not present) from the Bushire Residency for October 1808. It also notes that correspondence addressed to the Captain from India is being forwarded via the Fury.
